text:
About Herbs 4+
[
Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center
](https://apps.apple.com/de/developer/memorial-sloan-kettering-cancer-center/id554267165)
-
- Gratis
Screenshots
Beschreibung
About Herbs is presented by the Integrative Medicine Service of Memorial Sloan Kettering.
Key features:
• 290 Entries on herbs, botanicals, and supplements with purported benefits, side effects, drug interactions & more
• Objective information backed by scientific references
• Formatted for both healthcare professionals and consumers
• Search by herb or supplement
• Save favorites for offline availability or to discuss them with your physician for safe use
• Explore featured products and services
• Updated weekly
• Original art renderings
Memorial Sloan Kettering is one of the world’s premier cancer centers, committed to exceptional patient care, leading-edge research, and outstanding educational programs. In this app, our Integrative Medicine Service, under the leadership of a pharmacist and botanicals expert, provides comprehensive, objective information about herbs, botanicals, and supplements, as well as links that educate on the evidence for integrative therapies and programs offered by our Integrative Medicine Service.
Medical Disclosure
This content is provided as general health information only. It is not to be used as a substitute for medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment of any health condition or problem. Any questions regarding your own health should be addressed to your own physician or other health care provider.
Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center makes no warranties or express or implied representations whatsoever regarding the accuracy, completeness, timeliness, comparative or controversial nature, or usefulness of any information contained or referenced in this app. Memorial Sloan Kettering does not assume any risk whatsoever for your use of the information contained herein. Health-related information changes frequently and therefore information contained above may be outdated, incomplete, or incorrect. Statements made about products have not been evaluated by the US Food and Drug Administration.
You are hereby advised to consult with a physician or other professional health care provider prior to making any decisions, or undertaking any actions or not undertaking any actions related to any health care problem or issue you might have at any time, now or in the future. In using this information, you agree that neither Memorial Sloan Kettering nor any other party is or will be liable or otherwise responsible for any decision made or any action taken or any action not taken due to your use of any information provided herein.
Neuheiten
Version 2.0
- Removed initial data download
- Removed offline mode
- Minor bug fixes
Bewertungen und Rezensionen
Great app, current version crashes constantly
I used the app weekly for my studies and out of interest, and am very fond of it. But the newest version makes it useless, since it crashes every time I try to go to a remedy/therapy...
App-Datenschutz
Der Entwickler, Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center, hat darauf hingewiesen, dass die Datenschutzrichtlinien der App den unten stehenden Umgang mit Daten einschließen können. Weitere Informationen findest du in den
[Datenschutzrichtlinien des Entwicklers](https://www.mskcc.org/privacy).
Keine Daten erfasst
Der Entwickler erfasst keine Daten von dieser App.
Die Datenschutzpraktiken können zum Beispiel je nach den von dir verwendeten Funktionen oder deinem Alter variieren.
[Weitere Infos](https://apps.apple.com/story/id1538632801)
